Babel.lore: All legends must one day fall, but their legacy shall be remembered forevermore.  These memories exist in the hearts of all,  and pave the path forward in hopes to create a world where all may find peace,  however rocky that path may be.

Sagittarius.lore: The hide of the centaur is extraordinarily magical in the right hands. It is told to allow the user to gain the swiftness of the horse, but also leaves them vulnerable to hard hitting attacks.

majorIds.Hurricane's Eye: +Hurricane's Eye: Violent Vortex applies 2 marks to every enemy it hits.

majorIds.Peaceful Effigy: +Peaceful Effigy: Your Totem will last twice as long.

Philosopher.lore: What better excuse is there to sit in the shade and think about life?

Abyss-Imbued Leggings.lore: Steeped in the deepest energies of the Ahms region void, these ornately-crafted leggings are given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.

Antebellum.lore: Only the naive celebrate a ceasefire. Not a second wasted, a merciless arms race against the inevitability of war has left you ready to unleash hell the moment the armistice breaks.

Enhanced Meditation Robe.lore: The psalm tag has been replaced with a custom message from the armorer. What it says about the original owner is better left to the imagination.

Enhanced Panorama.lore: They added stilts to the leggings, so that they could "live up to the name." The fact you can barely stand in them is neatly avoided when you ask.

majorIds.Gentle Glow: +Gentle Glow: Orphion's Pulse and Fluid Healing restore more health, especially to allies, but at a slower speed.

Enhanced Pickpockets.lore: Aside from the added plating, they look more or less intact. Somehow, that doesn't surprise you.

Greaves of the Veneer.lore: Forged from mystic, previously unknown metals revealed in the deepest dwarven mining site to date, these sleek, glowing greaves are believed to be utterly indestructible.

Lemon Legs.lore: Due to an unfortunate accident where he choked on a lemon, an unremarkable mercenary became a laughing stock. He later managed to shed the title, as he left no one alive who remembered the name.

Post-Ultima.lore: These leggings are the last remaining piece of a historical set of armor, created with such power as to be thought impossible long ago.

Impossibility Threshold.lore: Visions unknowable and faces unnamed. A violent cacophony with no end in sight. But beyond that- a clarity. A fleeting moment where the rules speak their names, just on the other side. You need to get closer. You need to be able to see.

Bridge of the Divide.lore: These leggings hold the interest of many researching the corruption, as they are the only documented case of a non-corrupt fusion of dark and light energy, made of pure twilight.

majorIds.Expunge: +Expunge: When using Heal, cast one instant pulse that heals 15% of your max health.

Holy Greaves.lore: Many blacksmiths have tried to craft their products in this armor's image, but none so far have been able to capture the brilliance of these Bovemist-blessed greaves.

Kelight's Shield.lore: Used by the Temple of the Legends' strongest guard, the shielded plating is enchanted with a powerful ward to stave off the effects of the corruption.

Eden-Blessed Guards.lore: Consecrated by Qira herself with blessings unknown to all but her, these ornately-crafted leggings are given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.

Nostalgia.lore: It once held little meaning, another lilac left unnoticed in the quotidian meadows of yesteryear. Yet just its scent brings forth a deluge of memory, crashing down with the force of a time long past.

majorIds.Brachiate: +Brachiate: Grappling Hook has 25% increased range and increased velocity, but no longer pulls enemies.

Jungle Rogue.lore: King of the Jungle—it's a title reserved for the apex of the apex, and yet from where you swing across the canopy, this beast of supposed royalty is but another victim of your thievish pursuits.

Darkiron Scrap.lore: Despite being only an impure scrap of the normally sturdy blackiron, these heavy leggings still have extreme defensive capabilities.

majorIds.Gruesome Knots: +Gruesome Knots: Bleeding and Twisted Tether deal double damage, but Bleeding duration is reduced.

Pain Cycle.lore: Every ounce of your suffering must be made worth it. Otherwise, what was the point of it all?

Eradian Cuissards.lore: Abandoned by the dwarven Ramriders in their heyday, this hefty armor forged to protect a steed sees little use but littering the steppes of the upper heights. A memento of a slaughter, in days long past.

Perch of the Shrouded Sun.lore: Able to withstand the grasp of claws of pure steel, the perch of the Minokawa thrums with the might of a beast that can devour the sun. Given free reign of the skies, even the brightest of stars are no match.

Conductor.lore: Using an unorthodox method of smithing, these copper leggings are insulated with an extremely conductive blend of liquid to improve electrical discharge.

Kratke.lore: Spurred on by a drunken bet, the great Thanos smith Kratke improved a pair of leggings from a rival that were once thought to be perfection.

Gemini.lore: The gods of air and thunder, frustrated with being physically insubstantial alone, decided to band together to forge the ultimate leggings of defense.

Crystal.lore: Forged on Mage Island, the sparkling liquid-like armour is as hard as obsidian, but light and fluid as water. It glistens with the magic of the ocean winds.

majorIds.Entropy: +Entropy: Meteor falls three times faster.

majorIds.Rally: +Rally: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless.

Infernal Impulse.lore: If the depths of hell allows you this, is staying human an equal trade or a fool's choice?

Enhanced Duskshield.lore: They look extremely bulky and uncomfortable...do they have a right to call it "enhanced"?

Windborne.lore: Orders, cannonfire, calls for surrender—the wind carries all. To ride the winds is to harness the lifeblood of battle, infiltrating up the veins of command with mere token resistance.

Ohms' Rage.lore: These ancient, spark-coursing greaves are all that remains of the great thunder mage Ohms' favorite golem familiar after a dark force turned it against its masters.

Opulenity.lore: Made of an uncommonly used fabric called denim, these fashionable leggings exude style and elegance. Surely wearing them would bring you luck?

majorIds.Rusted Ichor: +Rusted Ichor: Boiling Blood cooldown is reduced by 0.5s and inflicts 40% slowness, but deals no damage.

Reliquiae.lore: Ancient and new hearts beat as one.

Titanium Grievers.lore: Crudely misshapen greaves made from haphazard scrap found about the Starfield. You sense a foreboding notion that donning such a thing would be the end of sensing anything at all.

Runebound Chains.lore: You know better than anyone else that there’s always a sliver of truth behind the tallest of tales.

majorIds.Sorcery: +Sorcery: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost.

Knee.lore: "I thought aiming for the legs would disable the enemy. Turns out they can drag themselves with their arms just as quick." -Therck, Ragni Soldier 3rd Division

majorIds.Juggle: +Juggle: Mutilate adds an additional 12 hits. All hits are reduced by ÓÄÖ-10%.

majorIds.Flashfreeze: +Flashfreeze: Ice Snake is instant and freezes for +1s.

Impact Winter.lore: Do you think you can survive with a sky choked by snow and ash? More importantly, do you think anything else can?

Doomsday Omen.lore: Something is lurking—it must be, in the eerie silence that leaves you so utterly alone. And these remains… Are they a reminder of one who didn’t stay quiet, or does what lurks in the unknown already know you’re here?

Aleph Null.lore: It's a strange feeling, running forever to reach the horizon knowing another lies just as far past.

Winter's Essence.lore: These pure, snow-white leggings are rumored to have been crafted by the legendary ice mage Theorick. The people of Nesaak view them as cursed, seeking to destroy them in a bid to stop the endless winter surrounding them.

majorIds.Gentle Glow: +Gentle Glow: Orphion's Pulse and Fluid Healing restore more health, especially to allies, but at a slower speed.

Spinneret.lore: "...Spiders have a weak point in the cephalothorax, essentially the neck. A small target, but it isn't as tough to chop through as the rest of them. ..." -Admiral Aegis' Guide To Nivla Threats, Chapter 3

Vaward.lore: A once-great hero left behind these sturdy, reliable greaves, trusting those after her to be able to use their power to protect others, should they don them. Her courage fuels their wearers.

Chaos-Woven Greaves.lore: With threads of fundamentally opposing magic delicately woven together, these ornately-crafted greaves are given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.

majorIds.Pounce: +Pounce: Escape becomes a forward lunge.

Alternator.lore: Llevigar's schools of wizardry are notorious for their difficult training regimens. These leg plates, forcing users to balance spellcasting with direct combat, are often cited as the tipping point for successful wizards.

majorIds.Cherry Bombs: +Cherry Bombs: Turns Smoke Bomb into firecrackers that fly farther, tighter, and deal ÓÄÖ85%, ÓÄÅ25%, and ÓÄÄ25% instantly.

Conspirator's Trickpockets.lore: No reign lasts forever. Not while your schemes remain unnoticed.

Dead Sands.lore: Found in the middle of the Almuj desert, these greaves seem to slowly poison all life around them. Theorists suggest they were the handiwork of a wicked necromancer, though the truth is not known.

Gold Digger.lore: "With the corruption seemingly tied to the emeralds dug by the Roots, people thought gold was the next best thing, the idiots." -Gerald, Retired Miner

Dark Shroud.lore: Wearing this deceptively simple shroud causes the user to fade into the shadows, sometimes flickering out of existence for a moment.

Chained Pixels.lore: Materials of all sorts have been lashed together in this crude, blocky set of leggings. From darksteel to leather to rotting wood, each part is a perfect square. It has, so far, been impossible to recreate.

Scorched Antiquity.lore: These hollowed spikes still hold the lingering embers of the event that formed this caldera long ago, lending an almost unnatural glow. It's a comforting warmth, though the force of the eruption remains dormant, primed for the slightest push.

Asphyxia.lore: A condition of severely deficient supply of oxygen to the body that arises from abnormal breathing; practitioners that abuse specific magic combos are often found incapacitated by said condition.

majorIds.Reckless Abandon: +Reckless Abandon: Sacrifice War Scream's defense bonus to give Tempest ÓÄÅ+5%, ÓÄÇ+15%, ÓÄÄ5% and 2 extra hits.
